website_summaries.verdict: Tetherball system with a sturdy base that allows you to move the equipment where you want.
pros: Works on any type of surface
Regulation-size ball has a soft feel that kids love
Steel pole and base resist rust and stand up to all kinds of tough weather
cons: Base could tip if someone leans on pole

customer_reviews.title: Very fun -- and here's the replacement part information
customer_reviews.text: My kids love, love, love this set. It was used daily last summer. It was easy to set up too - just be sure to follow the directions. My kids did love it a bit too much and broke the top assembly part (our doing) -- but it was super easy to replace the top assembly part. Here's the information you'll need (from an Amazon question I submitted): Replacement parts are available and can be ordered through our Customer Service Department. Our Customer Service Team can be reached at 800-225-3865 or by email at customercare@lifetime.com. Customer Service hours are Monday-Friday, 7:00 am to 5:00 pm and Saturday, 9:00 am to 1:00 pm (MT)."
customer_reviews.author: very interesting

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted this because she enjoyed tetherball as a youngster. I wanted a quality product that would last. Assembly was easy and the instructions provided were simple to follow. Filling the stand with sand was the hardest part. Pouring sand through the small holes took a while! A hand pump was provided to inflate the ball, but no needle for the pump was provided. Fortunately, I had one on hand. Once assembled the wife and I tried it out. It worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: S. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not all that Happy with This
customer_reviews.text: The reason being is we move it on and off the driveway daily for 2 weeks, it is full of water, the carriage bolts stripped the plastic seating that keeps them from backing out. I had to go to Home Depot and buy hex bolts, lock washers, washers, and a second set of nuts to keep the first set from backing out by doubling them up. Looking back on this filling the base 100% full probably contributed to the problem so I don't recommend that, too heavy for daily moving. I think the manufacturer should have taken this into account and designed the mechanical fastening system differently.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.D,

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly fun
customer_reviews.text: This little slice of heaven is an amazing creation. It was easy to assemble and easy to pull in and out of the garage. My kids LOVE it! They can’t get enough of it. Asking 10 times a day to go outside to play with it. It was for my daughters birthday, but turns out it’s fun for the whole family. There was a little glitch, the first one we ordered was shipped to the wrong state, but I emailed the company and they immediately shipped it back out. Great product and great customer service. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: K's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my 10yo son. He played with it a few weeks and the top piece that fits into the pole is so loose that it no longer works. We taped it up to tighten the hold, but it's constantly coming off after a few plays. I spent so much money that I keep fixing it every time and don't want to trash it. The pole is metal and I wish I could just use a metal drill to put the ring in it. Enjoy it if you get it. :-)
customer_reviews.author: V. Prado

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her friends play almost daily and it's holding up pretty well. Just make sure you tighten the screws all the way in. I'd left a couple a few threads shorts and it start to wobble. Upon fixing that, it's been working like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Harish

customer_reviews.title: Lasts for years
customer_reviews.text: We love this set and it's still being used years later. We filled ours following the instructions and after a few year we do notice some leak under the base when we move it. Nothing to bad especially considering how much we use this. My kids swing on the bars, my husband and I play against each other and hit as hard as we can. The ball is still in great shape, no tips or tears. Every now and then the clip up top will come loose and the ball will fly off mid play but it's and easy fit that even my kids can do by themselves. Overall- great purchase and definitely recommend buying it
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs and a huge yard. Of course they love playing fetch. I wanted a quality portable tetherball system so that I could both stretch and work my upper body, and play new games with the pups. As with all Lifetime products I’ve ordered, it arrived promptly and was nicely packaged. Easy to carry out back and set up, and once filled with sand it’s not going anywhere! The softer ball was a pleasant surprise, and wow, finally a pump with a place to store the needle. I’m happy. It’s perfect and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a long time. Improved with new base on wheels and different tetherball.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in February 2016. The ball died after three years in the sun. The base was filled with sand and never solidly held the pole straight. It moved when we played but we still enjoyed the set. Finally got so loose after 4.5 years that we replaced the base with an 88 lb umbrella base on wheels. Now it's so much sturdier and portable. Wish we did this earlier. Also got the Fun Gripper tetherball. Now the set is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: newmom

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it and it gets used at parties for sure
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and it gets used at parties for sure. 4 stars due to the fact that you can get hurt playing this. We had a hand injury, a person who got knocked in the face - hitting her glasses and another got hit in the jaw and had to ice it. The ball is kind of hard. Still a really fun game and these 3 injuries happened with adults so keep an eye on the kids. I remember playing this at the playground growing up and it was great fun so nice to be able to get a portable one for the yard.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Super FUN
customer_reviews.text: Took about 3 bags of 50 pound sand. This includes how much spillage you will get! I am having a blast with it and get very excited to the point my arms are sore. I cannot use the ones that you have to dig into the ground because where I live, the pipes are too high up and I do not want to hit something. This is perfect for where I live and definitely worth every penny. Setup was easy and did not take long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Our base leaks right out of the box so we aren’t able to fill it with water. It was my daughters bday present and needless to say she’s very disappointed. I submitted a return request and now I’m waiting to see if it’s approved. I didn’t realize it wouldn’t be that easy to return if it was defective out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Out of Town

customer_reviews.title: It's suitable for ages 8 and under
customer_reviews.text: It's a little short for age 9 and up and the base is large and gets in the way . It does stay still when playing though . My kids prefer the pole in the ground , so I'm reselling mine to a friend who has a concrete patio .
customer_reviews.author: beach mom

customer_reviews.title: The Kids Love It
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my niece and nephew, they are 7. Their mom said they love it. It was easy to put together and easy to move around the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Beth E. Mcshan

customer_reviews.title: Great outside toy for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for young children. This was so much easier than mounting a pole in the ground and pouring concrete for stability. Remember to lad the base full of sand or gravel for good stability.
customer_reviews.author: meme

customer_reviews.title: It did work very well when top would not stay ...
customer_reviews.text: It did work very well when top would not stay in pole, so i called customer service and they sent me a new part which worked. Bottom part was suppose to expand holding the bwll in the pole, first one didnt, replwcement paer they sent me did.
customer_reviews.author: JUDY

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I had one growing up. The kind you cement in the ground. It brought years of fun and some serious competition. The pole on this is wobbly. It's convenient to move around the yard though and not be tied to one location. The base is an obstacle that you need to watch for. Some twisted ankles can be foreseen if you step on it wrong when trying to wrap the ball around.
customer_reviews.author: WisMom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product. My kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I I really like this product only thing I did not like about it was when I tried to put it together the bottom part was not easy to assemble but other than that I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Merv

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fill completely
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to fill completely so it scares me when we have to move it because i'm afraid the base is going to break. But my kids love to play and as long as we keep it in the same place we're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: According to my youngest this was the best Christmas gift EVER
customer_reviews.text: According to my youngest this was the best Christmas gift EVER! We played it all winter long (in Wisconsin). The ball is soft. The attachment piece unscrews a lot though which can result in the ball and rope flying off of the base. That's bad and the reason this got 4-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amber D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as advertised. The whole pole assembly holds up well to exposure to the elements. Ever since I received it, it has been out doors and maintains its physical characteristics. Ultra portable and I use two 40 lb. bags to hold the base in place to make it ultra portable. Great product indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Chinito

customer_reviews.title: Deflated ball
customer_reviews.text: Purchsed three months ago and noticed the ball is fully deflated. Turns out air is leaking from all the seams so you are unable to pump up the ball. See bubbles in the picture clearly depicts the issue. I'll have to order a replacement ball. I also accidentally broke the pump needle and replaced it. It seems the needle is came with is pretty flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: drewster

customer_reviews.title: Best game ever!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is high quality as usual from lifetime products and is hours of entertainment. Not only do i love playing, the kids love playing but we have a dog that is a ball freak that hits the ball around for hours as well.
customer_reviews.author: Happy guy

customer_reviews.title: A definite winner with the Scouts and at home.
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to introduce a new sport to my Cub Scouts, who seem to have done everything. I remembered this from my own childhood and thought they would enjoy it. (I guess schools deem it too "dangerous".) They LOVED it and didn't want to stop to go home. This will definitely get a lot of use this summer. It even fit inside my SUV (just) for easy transport.
customer_reviews.author: Helen in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great for Family
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old grandson to have while he was visiting - He and his Dad put it up the first time in less 30 minutes. My Grandson wore out the adults and was still going strong. They hit it hard and it survived. I like it because it is portable and provides a lot of fun for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Fun, Adults love it more than the kids. Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. The pole looks like it can last forever. The ball and the string may need to be replaced eventually if left outside. We are keeping the ball and the string in our garage for the winter. The pole has been left outside. We used water instead of sand and was pretty sturdy enough. But I think we will get the sand for the spring time. My 5 yrd son kept getting hit in the face while playing with it. He got a little upset but kept at it and learned to avoid getting hit eventually. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: neokenny

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: My kids, age 13 and 11 love this Tetherball system. It was easy to set up and has endured hours of play time. The best part of the purchase is Lifetime's customer service. I tried to tinker with the ball assembly (to add a timer) and inadvertently lost a few parts. I emailed Lifetime and told them that I lost the parts. Lifetime immediately sent me the replacement parts, no charge. I did not use the replacement parts right away and misplaced them. No problem! Lifetime sent the parts to me again! No questions asked. I am a Lifetime fan - for life!
customer_reviews.author: Niki Kop

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much crap.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic base cracked almost immediately, spilling sand out. Base kept getting lose, and entire pole swings 3" + in either direction. Save your money and go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Justin T. A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Parts Were Missing, Bolts Didn't Fit
customer_reviews.text: It arrived without the needle necessary to inflate the ball and the bolts were too big. I had to go through the trouble of packing it back up and sending it back - and the package is heavy, not to mention bulky, so it was not easy to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: The pole busted right out of the bass only one week after purchased. It didn't look extremely sturdy to start with but I did not expect it to actually come apart that quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Decent Tetherball ;)
customer_reviews.text: First of all the reason I did 4 stars is because nothing is perfect. It is still wonderful for hill backyards. But it still needs a lot of water/sand to fill it. The tetherball ball is VERY soft and nice.
customer_reviews.author: p123sabl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backyard activity
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old and he loves it, To be honest, everyone loves it. When my friends come over to barbecue we all play. I recommend filling the base up with sand Especially if you live in a cold-weather state like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Believe.Me.I.AM.a.Pro

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised, with flaws
customer_reviews.text: Very challenging to fill this thing up with sand/gravel. Once filled, very difficult to move. I expect it will break under the normal weight of pea gravel when moving it, since the plastic will no doubt weaken with light, heat, and water. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: All the grandkids and the dog think this is great. It’s a sturdy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: The ball is softer than ones you find at elementary ...
customer_reviews.text: The ball is softer than ones you find at elementary schools so that was a plus for us. We filled the bottom with water so it is stable while in play, but not hard for adults to move around the backyard. We also have 2 full grown huskies and luckily our 8 yr old can play as much as she wants and the ball does not hit the dogs even if they are directly underneath the court.
customer_reviews.author: hk

customer_reviews.title: 3 Maine winters, 2 rowdy boys, still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this just shy of 3 years ago, and it's still in great shape. My boys play with it year round, unless the snow is too deep. This will have been its 3rd Maine winter outside in the elements, and even with my boys being rough on it, it's still sturdy. Definitely a good buy. And the ball has never gone flat!
customer_reviews.author: WaterCrosser

customer_reviews.title: Portable tether ball
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandchild . He loved it but it broke quickly . The ball ripped and detached within a month . He was devastated. Hopefully the company will replace ???
customer_reviews.author: brooklyntv

customer_reviews.title: Was good at first
customer_reviews.text: Great overall. I was impressed with how solid the pole and base are. Wish the base had wheels so I can easily move it from the center of the driveway for storage. I think our cap is broken as it keeps flying off the top of the pole (taking the rope and ball with it). My husband has secured it 3 times now and my 11 yr old keeps hitting the ball super hard and sending it flying.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Merritt

customer_reviews.title: MUCH better quality than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Apparently, tetherball is cool for boys. Who knew? In my days, it was totally the girl thing to do. My son begged for a tetherball for his 10th birthday. I had visions of ugly cement posts and holes in my yard until I came across this. It's anchored with sand filled in the bottom (Yay!...no holes in my yard) and is durable enough to leave in place (provided you don't have HOA Nazis patrolling the neighborhood destroying fun for kids). We bring the ball in every night and the tetherball has gotten a lot of use over the last two months since we bought it. And, with Amazon Prime, we got this shipped free within 2 days. BONUS!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S

customer_reviews.title: Great balance, the stand doesn't leak
customer_reviews.text: We have played hard and long on this thing, and it totally stands up the to use and abuse. Great balance, the stand doesn't leak, the ball is good quality and hardly ever needs air. This was a great buy for the whole family!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Schatzmann

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: We really like having this in our yard. My 5 year old son will wake up early to get some tetherball time in the morning before logging on to school. Gave 4 stars because its a bit wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Boots4347

customer_reviews.title: Great system, great value, but the ball string connecto isn't designed well.
customer_reviews.text: The system is great. Multiple families have bought this system in our neighborhood this summer and the kids have had great fun using them. the only thing is that the top anchor that connects the ball string to the pole isn't designed well and keeps coming loose. It has to be tighten regularly and it could be damage if not tighten. other than that, great fun and value for the purpose which we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: S W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Easily set up, easily moved. Sturdy and super fun. We are the home for all the neighborhood kids bc of this set! I highly recommend it for anyone who wants their kids to get competitive in outdoor activities right on their backyard.
customer_reviews.author: sandy wolf

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! Doesn’t move when weighted and all love it! I would say if your going to move it to drain the base water as it seems the pressure may make the base screws crack the plastic. I wouldn’t chance it. Super easy to move with empty base and tether and ball can be easily removed fir winter storage, etc.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old granddaughter for her birthday. It was a perfect time since the pandemic has change everything. She loved it and keeps her busy
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2 oldest kids, 10 and 7 for the summer. We don't have a real big yard but wanted something fun for them. Little did I know adults would play it just as much of not more. The stand holds the pole fine and rarely wobbles. It's not as good as cementing the pole into the ground but we don't want that. We've had nothing but fun with this set.
customer_reviews.author: C.Alexander

customer_reviews.title: brings back memories
customer_reviews.text: i loved tetherball as a kid. easy to put together by myself. and im a tiny lil woman. only thing i hate was that filling it was sand proved to be a tedious task, so i used water instead. i wish we were able to take the lid off the top of the base and fill it with sand.
customer_reviews.author: CHASE

customer_reviews.title: Great memories
customer_reviews.text: Tetherball was the rage for us boomers in the 60's and we were so pleased to purchase this for our grandchildren, ages 5 and 2. They love it and can play it together (not as easy for the 2 year old) and with adults. It is a terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun
customer_reviews.text: Loads of fun playing with my family... this is sturdy and I only use water to fill the base to make it portable... I fill it an drain it everytime we use it so that I store it away ... and I can tell you that it doesn't budge... The ball is also very comfortable and doesn't hurt my 10 yr old's hands when he plays ..
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: Tetherball what else can I say.. AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Who don't love Tetherball.. This is AWESOME & I CAN TAKE IT ANYWHERE I GO.. A++++ Thanks again.. I'll be back..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but able to tip over if pulled.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of flimsy and I made sure everything was tight. The bottom is full of water and my dog, who is about 34 pounds, was able to grab the ball and pull the whole thing over. The top came out and the ball, (which is of course my fault) is flat.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahjanel

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loved It
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble with one wrench. 2 people recommended but not required. Nice design. 5 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed with this set. It never really was sturdy. The ball falls off from the top often. The pole loosens and shakes and can’t really be properly tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great while it worked well, but...
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it lasted! We bought this in April, 2013. It did pretty well the first summer, though the pole was often loose and needed to be tightened. That problem became increasingly bad and now the pole tilts so much that it can tip over easily. This makes for a dangerous game of tetherball, so after just one good summer and one summer of troubles, we won't be using it anymore. The ball held up really well for us and the kids and adults had a great time using it when it stood up well. Wish we could get a new pole/base for less, considering how short of a time it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: jpal

customer_reviews.title: This tetherball system is absolutely amazing. We used to have a less expensive one ...
customer_reviews.text: This tetherball system is absolutely amazing. We used to have a less expensive one that we created a concrete base in a bucket for and it simply didn't last. Everyone in my family has a blast with it. One of the suggestions was to use sand instead of water in the base as it would make it more stable. Getting the sand that we had into the little hole was not working, but we find the water has enough weight to make the base stable enough for our use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Seems to function as good as I could expect I do question how long it will last with durability
customer_reviews.author: Blain elliott

customer_reviews.title: Five Star service
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun Update: I purchased this four years ago. We enjoyed it but the top cap broke off a year ago and it has been sitting forlornly in our garden. I just found the brochure and receipt and on a whim called the company to ask if I could get a replacement and they are sending it free of charge! Great service, very nice of them to replace the top cap. Highly recommend the product and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Judith W.

customer_reviews.title: It is fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: We filled this with sand and after a summer of dragging it back in and out of the garage we have put a small hole in the bottom and the sand leaks out. This is very well made and mean't to be left in one spot! It is fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a couple weeks now; bought it for my son and the whole family enjoys it. The ball has held up fine (I think we've pumped it once). It's sturdy enough for adults to play. We put water in the base and haven't had any problems. The latch that connects the rope to the top of the pole comes loose once in awhile, but it's not hard to re-twist. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Agree13

customer_reviews.title: Great for exercising dogs!!
customer_reviews.text: Mabel & Bertie LOVE it! Not really recommended for indoor use, but it was raining outdoors. For the pups, could have just used 2 of the pole pieces. I had to add length to the included rope to make it low enough for the queens of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn G

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional  quality
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons love this. Easy to move from place to place in the yard. Exceptional quality.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: wobbly and the ball when just feeling feels soft, but while hitting is hard
customer_reviews.text: wobbly and the ball when just feeling feels soft, but while hitting is hard and really is painful after a while - coming from a tetherball pro.
customer_reviews.author: Reena

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the
customer_reviews.text: My kids play hard and this thing keeps up with them. Great addition to the backyard
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Even my dog likes this tetherball set!
customer_reviews.text: I have filled the base with water for the moment. If my grandkids really play hard with it,then I'll switch to sand. The ball is well made. The base is well made but allows the pole to wobble.
customer_reviews.author: John Treble

customer_reviews.title: Great gift... for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece and nephew, but their two golden labs play with it the most. Hope the rope holds up.
customer_reviews.author: EMB

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Kids love, suoer sturdy. Have had it for almost 4 months and have had NO issues!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie lynne

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Tetherball system for my 9 year old daughter and 6 year old son. It was easy to put together and to fill the base with water. I mainly purchased this one because we could move it around the back yard as compared to cementing a pole into a permanent location. I filled the base with water and added some 2 gallons of biodegradable (RV/Marine) anti-freeze. The tether ball that was included was good quality. We have been using it for several weeks and have had a great time with it. No complaints and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: B'ville Dad

customer_reviews.title: Package was missing a base plate
customer_reviews.text: Kids were so excited to play with the tether ball set after they got it from Santa. When we went to put it together it was missing a base plate. Now everything is put on hold until we contact the manufacturer on Monday. Just disappointed that the package did nor have everything it promised to have.
customer_reviews.author: 1 Savy consumer

customer_reviews.title: great investment for summer fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids and their friends love it!! Easy to put together. We filled the base with water and added bleach..You can't roll it to a new location in your yard when the base if full but my husband and son successfully relocated it to a different part of our yard. Some splashing of water but we just topped the base off. I needed to pump up the ball twice and used my own ball pump. It's worth the $ and my kids are having fun with their friends.
customer_reviews.author: karen goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: This really gets used a lot, big kids, adults and even the little people love this. My two year old loves hitting the ball, laughs a big belly laugh! Best gift I could of given my 10 year old grand daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Gma Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to play tetherball and since we purchased this he is outside all the time playing. It was quick and easy to put together. The top piece has come off a few times, but it is an easy fix. This was a great purchase and my son absolutely loves it. I took off one star due to the top piece coming off.
customer_reviews.author: HaloFan15

customer_reviews.title: Family loved playing. We filled with water so easily movable ...
customer_reviews.text: Family loved playing. We filled with water so easily movable as we didn't want grass to die underneath the stand. Grandkids want to come over all the time to play so it was a great purchase. They have fun like I remembered from my youth when I played tetherball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and has survived the northern weather for 2 years so far. Easy to move, too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Linardi

customer_reviews.title: Great for Texas Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for niece and nephews. It is a great outdoor game for the state of Texas. My sister had to get some sand to put into the bottom so it wouldn't fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Sturdy and fun for the family while stuck at home. Would recommend 2 people to assemble. It was a bit more than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to mounted tetherballs
customer_reviews.text: Overall we like this tetherball system. Components seem to be of high quality. Instructions were straighforward, making assembly easy (my 11 year old did it). We filled the base with water but wish for just a little more weight. At times the pole can get swaying a little bit, but using sand may make a difference. The ball and rope themselves are high quality and a great desgn, allowing the ball to be replaced without replacing everything.
customer_reviews.author: Xcitbl

customer_reviews.title: It was better than expected
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 10 year old daughter. Turns out the whole family loves it. It was better than expected. Good quality. Literally has given my child hours of fun. It's hard not to join in.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: This should have been a great product!
customer_reviews.text: At this price point, this product should be easier to put together (I'm referring to the top part, where the rope attaches to the pole - the rest was fine) and should last more than 10 minutes of pretty gentle play before coming apart completely. This was my son's biggest gift for his birthday and we are all very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, but not very sturdy while using. The poles moves quite a bit when playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tether ball
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dog. Worked wonderful for the grandkids but my dog tore it up within 2 weeks. Dog is medium size and about 30 pounds. She killed the ball then tore it off the rope. Then tore the rope off the pole swinging on it. I would suggest better attachments. Otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and their friends love playing this. It was easy to assemble and in the winter I emptied the water out of the base and stored it in the garage. I do make the kids take the ball down and store it in the garage during the summer months because someone told us that the ball will get hard if exposed to rain then sun.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaM

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably frustrating to put together. Missing parts. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably frustrating to put together. Missing parts. The nylock nuts are impossible to get the screws through. Have to put them through the plastic at the bottom of the nut which is nearly impossible. Still working on that. What should have taken a half hour is taking forever. If i would have known at the beginning I would never have bought it. I hope it is worth it when i finally get it done - someday!
customer_reviews.author: K. johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his tether ball court. Every day that’s all he wants to do right when he comes from school, right when he wakes up, he’s obsessed 😆
customer_reviews.author: Dnis

customer_reviews.title: So incredibly flimsy and disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Spent the money and purchased this item. It was easy to install but after 8 yr old grandson played it twice, the pole became incredibly floppy and sways all over the place. I'm so upset that we spent the money and it is garbage. We have it filled all the way to the brim with sand and all bolts are tight.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves his new tether ball set! It’s been 3mo (it was a Christmas gift) and it’s still holding strong, even with the occasional adult play! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Pdubbs grma

customer_reviews.title: Great to my 8 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old Loves it. It does wobble... but it doesn’t matter at all. She is out there very day!
customer_reviews.author: KITTUSH1002

customer_reviews.title: Ball keep coming unattached from hook
customer_reviews.text: If anyone has had this issue or can help me resolve please let me know. The hook where the ball is attached keeps coming loose. we keep wreathing it and screwing it tight but then the next day it comes loose and falls off its hook-----great product if the ball would stay attached.
customer_reviews.author: bruce hofert

customer_reviews.title: Fun & Practical
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids love it and I love the portability. I recommend following directions for treatment and placement during extreme cold. It's great for kids, moms and even grandmothers! It is a time proven game made easier!
customer_reviews.author: Mona Flindall

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, flimsy, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and after a week the pole became loose and rocked side to side during play. Also when not using it leans to one side. Flimsy, and It cannot be permanently tightened. Save the money. We bought the voit set for 3x the price and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for neighborhood kids
customer_reviews.text: This tetherball system was just what we needed. It is nice and tall and it is "rollable" sideways to move it out of the way. The only drawback is that you can't really lift it without emptying the water out of the base. All the neighborhood kids come to play tetherball at our house now! One of the reviewers had mentioned not to overinflate the ball, so we made sure not to do that. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Crochet2

customer_reviews.title: Good fun!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a Christmas gift for our 8 year old son and he loves this! He and his friends love playing. Nothing will beat the in ground pole but for the price and a couple of 8 year olds it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: poor quality - followed the instructions but the pole constantly ...
customer_reviews.text: poor quality - followed the instructions but the pole constantly wobbles. the ball goes flat the next day (but they do provide a small air pump). the knots on the string are not tied correctly so the ball will fly off the pole. i really wanted to like this also because it is made by a USA company, but unfortunately the product performed like something you get from a cheap Chinese-made company. hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Sparta1713092708

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this. It is very durable and heavy once filled with water at the base.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon W

customer_reviews.title: I love this system
customer_reviews.text: I love this system! We bought this for our boys to play outside but we are military and move too often to permanently mount a pole. We used water to fill the base and even when my husband and I play there are no stability issues with the base or pole. The ball is nice and soft but good quality. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: seaturtle22

customer_reviews.title: Fun addition to our backyard.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these as a child, now with kids of my own had to get one again. They're still a little young to play it as meant, but they love just swinging it around.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: It's a family affair!
customer_reviews.text: The kids received this as a gift for Christmas and they LOVE it! The entire family enjoys using it. Even our dog gets a kick out of trying to chase the ball. It's surprisingly stable and well constructed. No complaints at all! We debated over getting the imbedded version for stability, but opted for this one because of portability. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: DMSlagSkal

customer_reviews.title: They love the Tetherball System!!!
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift, and they love it! Good construction and sturdy. The base was filled with the recommended amount of sand (if I remember it is 150 lbs or about 3 to 4 bags of play sand we got at HD). Bottom line is ... this is great for kids!
customer_reviews.author: SJBG

customer_reviews.title: My kids loved this while it lasted but the pole didn't stay ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this while it lasted but the pole didn't stay up very well. I don't know if we built it wrong or what but it doesn't stand well.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fun
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a couple of years now and is is holding up well. We have replaced the ball but that is expected as the pole is out in all kinds of weather. Highly recommend especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tired Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for small schoolyard!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for our elementary school. The kids are having a ball! They earned these by turning in Box Tops for Education, so they know they were the ones who facilitated them being a part of their playground equipment. They are taking great pride in their ownership. The portability is a necessity for a small schoolyard, and they are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Margo A.

product_meta.title: Lifetime 90029 Portable Tetherball System
product_meta.description:
Lifetime's Tetherball System is engineered with heavy-duty construction for high-performance play and a soft-surface ball for safety. Our Tetherball System features a weather- and rust-resistant steel pole and with a portable base constructed of high-density polyethylene (HDPE) that won't crack, chip, or peel. Built to last, our tetherball system will entertain the whole family for years to come. Lifetime brings another childhood game home with the Lifetime Tetherball System. Gone are the days of playing Tetherball exclusively in the schoolyard. Now the whole family can enjoy professional playground equipment in the safety and convenience of your own yard. Our portable tetherball system provides your family with a lot of fun in a small amount of space. This system is designed with a convenient portable base, just like our portable basketball systems. Just fill the base with sand or water and your tetherball system is ready for spirited play.

AMAZON.COM
Bring a little playground flair to your backyard with the Lifetime portable tetherball system. Engineered using heavy-duty, weather- and rust-resistant construction, the tetherball system provides high-performance play for ages 4 and older, including adults nostalgic for the tetherball games of their youth. The portable system is easy to move thanks to the 30-inch round HDPE base, which you can fill with sand or water and then roll to your desired location. The set also includes a regulation-sized, 8-inch, soft-touch tetherball, a 72-inch heavy-duty nylon cord with a steel attachment hook, and a 96-inch-tall steel pole. Built to last, the portable tetherball system will entertain the entire family for years to come.
feature_bullets: Portable tetherball system is safe for children and novices but strong enough to stand up to aggressive play
Heavy-Duty base provides portability and stability; Play on grass, sand or concrete
Includes: regulation-sized 8" softplay tetherball, 2" round pole, heavy-duty portable round base, pump, and needle.
Weather and rust-resistant; Designed for outdoor use
Pole and base backed by a 5-year limited manufacturer warranty
